name: OpenSDG
tagline: Open Source IoT Gateway for Cloud Platform
body:
### What is the OpenSDG.
> OpenSDG = Open Source IoT Gateway Board + Open Gateway Linux
> 
> An open IoT gateway is the one that has its software not dependent on its hardware.

### How it works.
>  OpenSDG is an open IoT gateway for Cloud Platform.

### Getting started with OpenSDG.
>  
*   IoT Platform
*   IoT Gateway

### Reference.
*   [Arduino](https://www.arduino.cc/ "Title"), Open-source Electronics Platform
*   [Cumulus Linux](https://cumulusnetworks.com/cumulus-linux/overview/#overview "Title"), Open Network Linux OS
*   [AWS IoT](https://aws.amazon.com/iot/?nc1=h_ls "Title"), IoT Cloud Platform

### Support or Contact
zeweiyang@gmail.com
